compliant.section: Thank you for visiting this Web site (the "Site") and your privacy is of great importance to us.
compliant.legal provisions: Principle of transparency and fairness - providing clear and concise information about data processing.

compliant.section: Please read this privacy policy before using the Site or submitting any personal information.
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided when personal data are collected from the data subject.

compliant.section: Please note that you do not need to provide any personal information to visit the Site.
compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation and data minimisation - only collecting data that is necessary.

non_compliant.section: However, when Macronix receives information about you, we may use it to fulfill you specific request, to provide a better service, or to improve the Site.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing - needing a lawful basis for processing (e.g., consent, contract, legitimate interest).
non_compliant.amend: Specify the lawful basis for each processing purpose (e.g., consent for marketing, contract for fulfilling requests, legitimate interest for service improvement) and provide separate options for users to consent to each purpose.
